de.jscholz.jminesweeper.minesweeper

Class Minefield

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jscholz.jminesweeper.minesweeper.Minefield
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMinefield

    class Minefield
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMinefield
    The implementation of the IMinefield. It will represent the game-board of this game. The board holds all cells and is responsible for the game handling.

    • Nested Class Summary
